Package com.xtructure.xutil.valid.coll

Utilities for validating collections.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractQuantityCondition A base class for conditions based on the contents of collections.
AbstractQuantityCondition.AbstractXmlFormat<T extends AbstractQuantityCondition> base implemention of an xml format for AbstractQuantityCondition
HasElementsCondition A condition that checks if an object (of type array or Collections) has specified elements.
HasElementsCondition.ConditionXmlFormat implementation of an xml format for HasElementsCondition
HasKeysCondition A condition that checks if a Map contains particular keys.
HasKeysCondition.ConditionXmlFormat implementation of an xml format for HasKeysCondition
HasLengthAtLeastCondition A condition that checks if a given object (of type String or array) has at least a given length.
HasLengthCondition A condition that checks if a given object (of type String or array) has a given length.
HasSizeAtLeastCondition A condition that checks if a given object (of type collection or map) has at least given size.
HasSizeAtLeastCondition.ConditionXmlFormat implementation of an xml format for HasSizeAtLeastCondition
HasSizeCondition A condition that checks if a given object (of type Collection or Map) has a given size.
HasSizeCondition.ConditionXmlFormat implementation of an xml format for HasSizeCondition
HasValuesCondition A condition that checks if a Map contains particular values.
HasValuesCondition.ConditionXmlFormat implementation of an xml format for HasValuesCondition
IsEmptyCondition A condition that checks if a given object is empty.
 

Package com.xtructure.xutil.valid.coll Description

Utilities for validating collections.
